---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/solana/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
pagination_next: null
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/6b8502c2-77b3-4541-a742-62ff337f0d15' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `transferred`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4}
{
  "id": "6b8502c2-77b3-4541-a742-62ff337f0d15",
  "operation": "transfer",
  "state": "transfered",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "to_account_pubkey": "9c8oxENj8XrEM2EMadxUoifZgB1Vbc8GEYqKTxTfPo3i",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "538M3ptZsiHeDaRWX6RnFeuCbJcUwfDSU8YzDRBJnPx1AEQvk3to7n1VEWQyCz87oqZpsLC8obvxJNQizMCQauHZ",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T09:32:03.904Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T09:38:52.469Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your tokens!
